note.p: Civil servant. Private secretary to Lord John Russell, 1848. A principal clerk in the Treasury, 1860; assistant secretary, 1867. Auditor of the civil list.
Census returns of England and Wales 1871 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG10/52/53/44)
The Times, 24 January 1848, p. 5, 29 December 1860, p. 8, 5 October 1881, p. 9
